text:
"make install DESTDIR=<blah>" currently fails for 2.0.43 in
$SRCBASE/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat. A workaround is to edit
$SRCBASE/srclib/apr-util/xml/expat/Makefile and change line 147 from:
   cd $$dir; $(MAKE) install; cd ..; \

to:
   cd $$dir; $(MAKE) DESTDIR=$(DESTDIR) install; cd ..; \

However I am unsure if this is the proper way to resolve this. Without this, a
"make install DESTDIR=<blah>" tried to mkdirs in the standard $PREFIX
(/usr/local/apache2). Refer bug 9792 "Introduce DESTDIR in Makefiles", and 7803
"make install root= from apache 1.3 doesn't work in 2.0.35".

Thanks ppl. <james@rcpt.to>
creator: james@rcpt.to
